title: Basics of Solicitors
headline: Learn how to become a solicitor in the UK in this free online law course that covers every aspect of the profession.
description: This law course explains how solicitors perform their roles in the UK. Legal practitioners play a crucial role in society and their legal skills are highly valued. We examine the key requirements that must be met before you become a solicitor. We then discuss the rigorous code of ethics and professional conduct and explain how to establish and maintain a healthy relationship with clients. Sign up to learn how to succeed as a solicitor in the UK.
courseDescription:
Do you want to become a solicitor in the UK but don’t know where to start? Don’t worry: we are here to explain all that you need to know to take the first steps on the path towards that goal. We begin with a definition of ‘solicitor’ and lay out the duties and responsibilities that come with the job. We also identify some key differences between solicitors and barristers.

The course then shows you how to develop a successful relationship with your clients. Being concerned with the rule of law, we establish the importance of ethics, principles and correct behaviours that are expected from a solicitor. We explain why it is so important to maintain an open and strong solicitor-client relationship. Solicitors don’t just have to deal with difficult clients but also face difficult judges or jury members. Success in court requires the kind of professionalism and principled behaviour that we cover in this law course.

Are you looking to start your own law firm? The course highlights the key requirements that need to be fulfilled by solicitors to set up their own law practice. We discuss the important skills and documentation required to succeed as a private legal practitioner. Solicitors are one of the most important professions in society, whatever their specialisation. They need both the right technical skills and an awareness of the ethical dynamics they face on the job that make the difference between success and failure. This law course lays out the basics of this lucrative and rewarding profession so enrol now to begin your journey towards a legal career in the UK.
